properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08.
1. S/V HEIDI, ONE PERSON ON BOARD, DISMASTED
   AND TAKING ON WATER IN 47-51.13N 020-22.00W
   AT 030139Z NOV. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
   TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
   PHONE: 44 344 382 0025,
   E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2505/23.
